name: Ant Colony
description:
Start the game with 1 Queen from one of the leaf-cutter ant species. Recruit Foragers to harvest Biomass from plants. Every 3 seconds (an in-game tick), your Queen will automatically convert Biomass into Fungus food that your colony can eat as it grows. Recruit more workers to convert more biomass per tick.

Right click plants to assign Idle Foragers to that plant. Left click plants to unassign ants from that plant.

Expansion requires lots of food and each ant requires 1 food every 60 seconds. You can turn off expansion by clicking the Grow Colony button. Win by reaching 100 population. Lose by reaching 1 population and running out of food.
